==========================================================================

About this upload:

I waited a long time to upload this album because I think independent bands like this should be supported, ESPECIALLY this band since they do so much to fight for a free and open internet.
That said, I also feel that art is meant to be shared and experienced by as many people as possible and I know that not everyone can afford to buy imports like this but hopefully those of you who can afford it will but a copy.

You can buy a physical copy of this album on Amazon Japan: http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/switch-language/product/B00I0TKUH6/ref=dp_change_lang?ie=UTF8&language=en_JP 
or at their official site: https://www.shop.the-hellish-vortex.com/
They also sell all their music in FLAC on their bandcamp site:
